Password Generator

How to choose a good password

Using at least one uppercase letter and one number in an eight-character password would take a computer one hour to crack.

Add in another symbol and now it'll take a computer eight hours to crack.

A 12-character password that has one uppercase letter, one number and one symbol is considered unbreakable, and it would take a computer 34,000 years to crack it.
